DOC.brief_summary: The investigator seek develop efficient effective approach provide brief behavioral health intervention risky substance use behavior compare brief coach direct intervention tailor report group .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Personalized Feedback Alone Substance Use Behaviors
DOC.detailed_description: Screening brief intervention ( SBIRT ) generally involve universal screen risky substance use behavior medical setting immediate provision 3-15 minute intervention find risk . In pilot study , investigator seek develop efficient effective approach provide brief behavioral health intervention field compare brief coach direct intervention tailor report group . The goal create cost-effective sustainable system provide consumer tailor information help initiate sustain lifestyle change necessary improve overall health . Hypothesis 1 : In medical setting , personalize feedback alone associate reduction risky substance use behavior . Hypothesis 2 : In medical setting , personalize feedback alone impact behavior information plus brief coach education session risky substance use behaviors..
DOC.criteria: Low level risky substance use high substance use risk level potential alcohol drug addiction dependence
